title._content: Image taken from page 133 of 'A Perilous Venture; or, the Days of Mary of Burgundy. Translated from the German [“Teuerdank's Brautfahrt”] by M. Hall, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Perilous Venture; or, the Days of Mary of Burgundy. Translated from the German [“Teuerdank's Brautfahrt”] by M. Hall, etc" Author: MEYERN, Gustav von. Contributor: HALL, M. - Translator Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12624.g.32." Page: 133 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: Warne & Co. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
